name: Robo Ball
description:
Put all your balls in the enemy side !

In Roboball, all you have to do is send your balls to the enemy. You can shoot, stun, block or dodge ball but at the end of the timer the team with the less  ball in their side win !

The game is 4 player only with 1 keyboard and 3 controllers (or 4 controllers).

Controls :

  • ZQSD / LeftStick : Move / Aim
  • LeftClick/ A : Shoot 
  • RightClick / B : Block
  • A-E / LT-RT : Super Block 

This game was made in under 40 hours for a GameJam
Also you can start a game with only 1 player by pressing enter in the player selection screen to try it if you are solo but you take out all the fun ;)
